about_the_game:
Tank vs Orcs is an action packed twin stick shooter in development where you get to live out the ultimate power fantasy; being a fricken' tank and battling endless hordes or orcs.
You'll have quite the arsenal of weapons at your disposal including chain gun, plasma rifle, chainsaw, rockets, cannons, and much more. Tank vs Orcs will also feature boss battles and some lite rogue like mechanics as well. A playable demo for PC and Mac is coming soon!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains pixel art blood and gore.
